questions.text: How frequently does your team deliver product increments?
What is the ratio of BAs/Product Owners to QA professionals in your team?
How integrated are third-party components in your codebase? (Percentage of code dependent on third-party integrations)
What is your approach to test automation?
How comprehensive is your Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) strategy regarding test data management and test environment management?

4: Balanced mix of scripted and scriptless automation
5: ALM integrated with Test Data Management (TDM)
ALM integrated with Test Environment Management (TEM)
Fully integrated ALM with both TDM and TEM
